annotations.title: Tiki Cocktail: Suffering Bastard

annotations.description: The Suffering Bastard has its roots in Cairo, served to allied troops in the 2nd World War on their way back to front. ********************************** Thi...
annotations.title: Making a Tiki Drink while WAY Too Hungover | How to Drink

textContent:
4 oz. -or- 120 ml. Ginger Beer
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Lime Juice
.25 oz. -or- 8 ml. Demerara Syrup
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. London Dry Gin
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Bourbon
Two Dashes Angostura Bitters

Shake and open pour onto ginger beer
Garnish with Orchid or mint or whatever

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ptQySXcqZOs&list=TLPQMjIxMTIwMTlbpuHEAypyYg&index=4

---

1oz (30ml) Brandy
1oz(30ml) Gin
1oz (30ml) Lime Cordial
1 Dash Angostura Bitters
Top 4oz (120ml) Ginger Beer
Mint Sprig Garnish
Orange Wedge Garnish

Shake and pour into collins over ice. 
Top with Ginger beer 
Garnish 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fWybeDk4DK4
title: Suffering Bastard
